translations: n.耐用品；非消耗性用品（durable 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The length of maturity of large consumer durables loans is usually within one year, with the longest up to three years (or shorten).
sentences.translation: 大额耐用消费品贷款的期限一般在一年以内，最长为三年(含三年)。

sentences.sentence: By 1950 Americans smoked 350 billion cigarettes a year and the industry accounted for 3.5% of consumer spending on non-durables.
sentences.translation: 到了1950年，美国人每年要吸3500亿支香烟，而烟草业在消费者非耐耗品开支中所占比重达3.5%。

sentences.sentence: Household spending will fall much further than it has to date, and sales of homes, cars and other consumer durables will decline markedly.
sentences.translation: 家庭开支将会日益下降，房屋、汽车和其他耐用消费品的销售将会明显下降。
